Title: Play with Fire
Plot: A woman's body is discovered in a small press box at a high-school football field, apparently the victim of strangulation.  An explosion in the Crime Lab destroys key evidence and injures Greg and Sara.
GuestStars: Olivia Rosewood, Bob Gunton, Max Martini, Luis Antonio Ramos, Rebecca McFarland, Brandon Kirsch, Josh Jacobson, Danielle Panabaker, Raymond Cruz, Luis Antonio Ramos
